item.description:
We will be reading Popular Music from Vittula by Mikael Niemi (Sweden).

When a Beatles record falls into the hands of 11 year old Matti, neither he nor his home village of Pajala, Sweden, will ever be the same. It is the early 1960s and both Matti and Pajala are about to enter adolescence.

One of the American Library Association Notable Book's top picks of 2005.

Also note that we are meeting on Sunday, June 22nd which is the 4th Sunday. We wanted to avoid any potential conflicts with Father's Day, which falls on June 15th, the third Sunday.

Link to this book on amazon.com: http://www.amazon.com...
item.name: Reading books by international writers June Meeting
